text: has shown us the need for preparedness and prevention. As a staunch believer in limited government intervention, I firmly believe that individuals and local communities should have the autonomy to make their own decisions in preventing the spread of the virus. It is essential to maintain our time-honored institutions and champion individual liberties, while taking necessary steps to protect our health. Let's rely on the strength of our national defense to combat this crisis together. 🇺🇸
